static FIBITMAP* FImageLoader ( const Path &  filename) [static]

Loads the FreeImage image.

For further use with FreeImage library's functions. Do not forget to unload image afterwards.

Parameters:
filenameName of the image.
Returns:

static void initMagick ( ) [inline, static]

initializes ImageMagick library

Use it in all binaries to allow reading up to 10k x 10k into memory, not HDD.

void SaveImageFP ( const Path &  filename,
const Map &  storage 
)

Save the array into float point TIFF image.

Stores the array in the float-point TIFF file. Be careful: limited number of editors/viewers/analyzers support float point format.

Parameters:
filenamethe name of the image file image.
storagethe array to be written to the image.

Definition at line 1235 of file common.cpp.

Referenced by SaveImage().

static void SaveImageINT ( const Path &  filename,
const Map &  storage,
float  minval = 0,
float  maxval = 0 
) [static]

Save the array into integer image.

Stores the array in the integer-based image. If minval is equal to maxval then the minimum and maximum values of the array data corresponds to black and white respectively.

Parameters:
filenamethe name of the image file image.
storagethe array to be written to the image.
minvalthe value corresponding to black.
maxvalthe value corresponding to white.
